name: Landing Pad
longDesc:
After 4 hours in your helicopter, you finally land seemingly in the middle of nowhere.
The air is humid here and full of buzzing insects.  You stand burried deeply in the forgotten jungle tucked away between mountains at the entrace to the lost ruins of 
Castle Charenji where you believe the Golden Scepter of Ma-go'Faan has been hidden for thousands of years.
You know that if you can find and retrieve the scepter, you would never have to work another day in your life.

The catch?

The castle is said to be cursed and that anyone who seeks the scepter will undoubtedly perish before they can retrieve it.

But, you don't really believe in curses...right?
shortDesc: You are back in the small clearing deep in the jungle where you landed your helicopter.

shelves.name: Helicopter
shelves.desc: You turn back to your one-person helicopter that is painted black with a green roof to blend into the jungle.

shelves.name: Nearby Bush
shelves.desc: You examin the shaggy bush and note that it has bright blue berries.

doors.name: Stone Gate
doors.desc: Before you is an ancient stone gate that stands 7 feet tall and 5 feet wide.  In the middle of the gate are intricate, metal symbols and what appears to be a rusty keyhole.
doors.unlock_desc: You have unlocked the gate and have slowly pushed it open to reveil the Antechamber inside.
